title._content: [Portrait of Guy Lombardo, Starlight Roof, Waldorf-Astoria, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Guy Lombardo, Starlight Roof, Waldorf-Astoria, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 206 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Lombardo, Guy, 1902- Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Conductors (Music)--1940-1950. Tubists--1940-1950. Starlight Roof Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
